HotelElement.Name: Bristol Serviced Lettings: Beaufort Court Apartments

Description.Text: Situated just half a mile from Bristol city-centre, our luxury modern apartments in Beaufort Court provide you with a fully-furnished home - including free wireless broadband access, secure courtyard parking, and a 42inch flatscreen TV with over 140 channels. The apartments are conveniently located just half a mile from Cabot Circus and one mile from the main rail and bus stations. We are a superb value alternative to traditional hotel accommodation, providing freedom, independence, and convenience. All of our apartments are furnished and decorated to an exceptionally high standard, providing you with a living, dining area and fully fitted kitchen which includes a washing machine, microwave, fridge/freezer, oven, hob and a full set of cutlery, plates and wine glasses. The furniture is modern and comfortable throughout. We are a child-friendly company, and will provide a travel cot free of charge should you need it. Secure off street parking is available at 6 GBP per night, per car. All the apartments are Non-smoking.

Ideally Located: Bristol City Centre - 1 kilometre M32, junction 3 - 0.8 kilometres Temple Meads Railway Station - 1.5 kilometres Bristol Bus and Coach Station - 1.5 kilometres Bristol International Airport - 14.5 kilometres Leisure Centre - 100 metres A secure car park is available at 6 GBP per night, per car.

Luxury One Bed Apartment (Double) - A superbly decorated 1 double bedroom fully-furnished apartment with ensuite, 42" HD TV with over 140 channels, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
Luxury One Bed Apartment (twin) - A superbly decorated 1 bed fully-furnished apartment, featuring 2 single beds, 42" HD TV with over 140 channels, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
Luxury Two Bed Apartment (double&twin) - A superbly decorated 2 bed fully-furnished apartment, featuring one double and two single beds, a 42" HD TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
Luxury Two Bed Apartment (Double/Single&Single) - A superbly decorated 2 bed fully-furnished apartment, featuring one double and one single beds in one bedroom and a single bed in the other one, a 42" HD TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
Luxury Two Bed Apartment (Twin&Single) - A superbly decorated 2 bed fully-furnished apartment, featuring three single beds, a 42" HD TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
Luxury Four Bed Apartment - A superbly decorated 4 bed fully-furnished apartment, featuring 2 double and 3 single beds, a 42" HD TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen.
